devdoc.author: Aave, SIGH Finance
devdoc.details: NOTE: The core does not enforce security checks on the update of the state (eg, getInstrumentTotalBorrows() does not enforce that borrowed is enabled on the Instrument). The check that an action can be performed is a duty of the overlying LendingPool contract.*

borrowingOnInstrumentSwitch(address,bool.details: Switches borrowing on a instrument. Also sets the stable rate borrowing

disableInstrumentAsCollateral(address).details: disables a instrument to be used as collateral

enableInstrumentAsCollateral(address,uin.details: enables a instrument to be used as collateral

getInstrumentAvailableLiquidity(address).details: gets the available liquidity in the instrument. The available liquidity is the balance of the core contract

getInstrumentConfiguration(address).details: this function aggregates the configuration parameters of the instrument. It's used in the LendingPoolDataProvider specifically to save gas, and avoid multiple external contract calls to fetch the same data.
getInstrumentConfiguration(address).return: Instrument's DecimalsBase LTV (Loan To Volume) as CollateralLiquidation ThresholdInstrument Used as Collateral or not*

getInstrumentCurrentAverageStableBorrowR.details: gets the _instrument average stable borrow rate. The average stable rate is the weighted average of all the loans taken at stable rate.

getInstrumentCurrentStableBorrowRate(add.details: gets the instrument current stable borrow rate. Is the market rate if the instrument is empty
getInstrumentCurrentStableBorrowRate(add.return: the instrument current stable borrow rate*

getInstrumentCurrentVariableBorrowRate(a.details: gets the instrument's current variable borrow rate. Is the base variable borrow rate if the reserve is empty
getInstrumentCurrentVariableBorrowRate(a.return: the instrument current variable borrow rate*

getInstrumentITokenAddress(address).details: gets the iToken contract address for the instrument
getInstrumentITokenAddress(address).return: the address of the iToken contract*

getInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress.details: gets the interest rate strategy contract address for the instrument
getInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress.return: the address of the interest rate strategy contract*

getInstrumentIsActive(address).details: returns true if the _instrument is active
getInstrumentIsActive(address).return: true if the _instrument is active, false otherwise*

params._instrument: the _instrument for which the information is needed

getInstrumentIsFreezed(address).return: true if the _instrument is freezed, false otherwise*

getInstrumentIsStableBorrowRateEnabled(a.details: returns true if the stable rate is enabled on _instrument
getInstrumentIsStableBorrowRateEnabled(a.return: true if the stable rate is enabled on _instrument, false otherwise*

params._instrument: the _instrument for which the information is needed

getInstrumentLastUpdate(address).return: the last updated timestamp of the _instrument*

getInstrumentNormalizedIncome(address).details: gets the normalized income of the instrument. a value of 1e27 means there is no income. A value of 2e27 means there there has been 100% income.

getInstrumentTotalBorrowsStable(address).details: gets the instrument total borrows stable

getInstrumentTotalBorrowsVariable(addres.details: gets the instrument total borrows variable

getInstrumentTotalLiquidity(address).details: gets the total liquidity in the instrument. The total liquidity is the balance of the core contract + total borrows

getInstrumentUtilizationRate(address).details: returns the utilization rate U of a specific instrument

params._instrument: the instrument for which the information is needed

getInstruments().return: the array of instruments configured on the core*

getUserBasicInstrumentData(address,addre.details: returns the basic data (balances, fee accrued, instrument enabled/disabled as collateral) needed to calculate the global account data in the LendingPoolDataProvider

params._user: the address of the user

getUserBasicInstrumentData(address,addre.return: User's Deposited Balance                         // returns IToken BalanceUser's Principal Borrow Balance                 // calculated by compound interest (stable / variable interests have different caculations)User's Origination Fee                         // stored value is returmedInstrument is enabled as collateral or not    // returns a stored boolean the principal borrow balance, the fee, and if the instrument is enabled as collateral or not*

getUserBorrowBalances(address,address).details: calculates and returns the borrow balances of the user

params._user: the address of the user

getUserBorrowBalances(address,address).return: the principal borrow balance, the compounded balance and the balance increase since the last borrow/repay/swap/rebalance*

params._instrument: the address of the instrument for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

getUserBorrowFee(address,address).return: the Borrow fee for the user*

getUserCurrentBorrowRateMode(address,add.details: users with no loans in progress have NONE as borrow rate mode

params._instrument: the address of the _instrument for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

getUserCurrentBorrowRateMode(address,add.return: the borrow rate mode for the user,*

getUserCurrentStableBorrowRate(address,a.details: the stable rate returned is 0 if the user is borrowing at variable or not borrowing at all

params._instrument: the address of the _instrument for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

getUserLastUpdate(address,address).details: the variable borrow index of the user is 0 if the user is not borrowing or borrowing at stable

params._instrument: the address of the _instrument for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

getUserLastUpdate(address,address).return: the variable borrow index for the user*

getUserUnderlyingAssetBalance(address,ad.details: gets the underlying asset balance (including the interest accured) of a user based on the corresponding iToken balance.

params._user: the user address

getUserUnderlyingAssetBalance(address,ad.return: the underlying deposit balance of the user*

getUserVariableBorrowCumulativeIndex(add.details: the variable borrow index of the user is 0 if the user is not borrowing or borrowing at stable

params._instrument: the address of the _instrument for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

getUserVariableBorrowCumulativeIndex(add.return: the variable borrow index for the user*

params._decimals: the decimals of the instrument currency
params._iTokenAddress: the address of the overlying iToken contract
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract*

initialize(address).details: initializes the Core contract, invoked upon registration on the AddressesProvider

instrumentStableBorrowRateSwitch(address.details: Switches the stable borrow rate mode on a instrument

isInstrumentBorrowingEnabled(address).details: returns true if the instrument is enabled for borrowing
isInstrumentBorrowingEnabled(address).return: true if the instrument is enabled for borrowing, false otherwise*

isInstrumentUsageAsCollateralEnabled(add.details: returns true if the _instrument is enabled as collateral
isInstrumentUsageAsCollateralEnabled(add.return: true if the _instrument is enabled as collateral, false otherwise*

isUserAllowedToBorrowAtStable(address,ad.details: checks if a user is allowed to borrow at a stable rate

params._amount: the amount the the user wants to borrow
params._user: the user

isUserAllowedToBorrowAtStable(address,ad.return: true if the user is allowed to borrow at a stable rate, false otherwise*

params._instrument: the address of the _instrument for which the information is needed
params._user: the address of the user for which the information is needed

isUserUseInstrumentAsCollateralEnabled(a.return: true if the user has chosen to use the _instrument as collateral, false otherwise*

liquidateFee(address,uint256,address).details: transfers the fees to the fees collection address in the case of liquidation

params._token: the address of the token being transferred

refreshConfiguration().details: updates the lending pool core configuration*

setInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress.details: updates the address of the interest rate strategy contract

params._rateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract*

setUserUseInstrumentAsCollateral(address.details: enables or disables a instrument as collateral

params._instrument: the address of the principal instrument where the user deposited
params._useAsCollateral: true if the depositor wants to use the instrument as collateral*
params._user: the address of the depositor

params.instrumentAddress: the address of the Instrument for which SIGH PAY is being being transferred [to SIGH Staking Contract]*

transferToFeeCollectionAddress(address,a.details: transfers the protocol fees to the fees collection address

params._token: the address of the token (instrument) being transferred
params._user: the address of the user from where the transfer is happening

transferToReserve(address,address,uint25.details: transfers an amount from a user to the destination instrument

params._instrument: the address of the instrument where the amount is being transferred
params._user: the address of the user from where the transfer is happening

transferToUser(address,address,uint256).details: transfers to the user a specific amount from the reserve. (used during REDEEMUNDERLYING(), BORROW() & FLASHLOAN() in LendingPool Contract)

params._instrument: the address of the instrument (underlying address) where the transfer is happening
params._user: the address of the user receiving the transfer

updateStateOnBorrow(address,address,uint.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a borrow action.

params._borrowFee: the fee on the amount borrowed
params._instrument: the address of the instrument which the user is borrowing
params._user: the address of the borrower

updateStateOnBorrow(address,address,uint.return: the new borrow rate for the user*

updateStateOnDeposit(address,address,uin.details: updates the state of the core as a result of a deposit action

params._instrument: the address of the instrument in which the deposit is happening
params._isFirstDeposit: true if the user is depositing for the first time*
params._user: the address of the the user depositing

updateStateOnFlashLoan(address,uint256,u.details: updates the state of the core as a result of a flashloan action

params._income: the income of the protocol as a result of the action
params._instrument: the address of the instrument in which the flashloan is happening

updateStateOnLiquidation(address,address.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a liquidation action.

params._amountToLiquidate: the amount being repaid by the liquidator
params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._collateralInstrument: the address of the collateral instrument that is being liquidated
params._collateralToLiquidate: the amount of collateral being liquidated
params._feeLiquidated: the amount of origination fee being liquidated
params._liquidatedCollateralForFee: the amount of collateral equivalent to the origination fee + bonus
params._liquidatorReceivesIToken: true if the liquidator will receive iTokens, false otherwise*
params._principalInstrument: the address of the principal instrument that is being repaid
params._user: the address of the borrower

updateStateOnRebalance(address,address,u.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a stable rate rebalance

params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._instrument: the address of the principal instrument where the user borrowed
params._user: the address of the borrower

updateStateOnRebalance(address,address,u.return: the new stable rate for the user*

updateStateOnRedeem(address,address,uint.details: updates the state of the core as a result of a redeem action

params._instrument: the address of the instrument (underlying address) in which the redeem is happening
params._user: the address of the the user redeeming
params._userRedeemedEverything: true if the user is redeeming everything*

updateStateOnRepay(address,address,uint2.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a repay action.

params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._borrowFeeRepaid: the fee on the amount that is being repaid
params._instrument: the address of the instrument on which the user is repaying
params._paybackAmountMinusFees: the amount being paid back minus fees
params._repaidWholeLoan: true if the user is repaying the whole loan*
params._user: the address of the borrower

updateStateOnSwapRate(address,address,ui.details: updates the state of the core as a consequence of a swap rate action.

params._balanceIncrease: the accrued interest on the borrowed amount
params._compoundedBorrowBalance: the amount borrowed plus accrued interest
params._currentRateMode: the current interest rate mode for the user*
params._instrument: the address of the _instrument on which the user is repaying
params._principalBorrowBalance: the amount borrowed by the user
params._user: the address of the borrower

devdoc.title: LendingPoolCore contract

InstrumentFreezeSwitch(address,bool).notice: allows the configurator to freeze/unfreeze the instrument. A freezed instrument does not allow any action apart from repay, redeem, liquidationCall, rebalance.

getInstrumentLastUpdate(address).notice: returns the timestamp of the last action on the _instrument

updateInstrumentCollateralParameters(add.notice: allows the configurator to update the loan to value of a instrument, liquidation threshold, liquidation bonus

userdoc.notice: Holds the state of the lending pool and all the funds deposited
